project_description: Survey Management Application providing admin FE environment for business users/owners with survey template creation, typology management, activation/deactivation, copying/export, versioning, role-based access, and audit capabilities

artifacts.stakeholder_engagement_matrix: 8 stakeholders identified with strategic focus on legal compliance, audit requirements, and operational risk
artifacts.enterprise_enabling_focus: Legal Support Management and Task Management implications prioritized
artifacts.risk_assessment: Medium regulatory risk requiring comprehensive compliance review

artifacts.business_pain_analysis: Legal documentation gaps, version control liability, data governance deficiencies, manual administrative overhead
artifacts.change_motivation: Regulatory compliance pressure, operational efficiency drivers, strategic business enablement
artifacts.high_level_objectives: Zero regulatory breaches, <48h SLA, 70% manual overhead reduction, 100% audit compliance
artifacts.success_criteria: Pass legal/audit review, seamless integration, 90% user adoption, complete audit trail
artifacts.strategic_outcomes: Immediate compliance gains, medium-term efficiency improvements, long-term scalable foundation

artifacts.scope_matrix: Legal Support Management + Task Management components in scope, algorithm changes and user experience extensions out of scope
artifacts.key_inclusions: Comprehensive audit trails, data governance controls, AD-integrated access control, lifecycle management workflow
artifacts.key_exclusions: Algorithm evaluation changes, survey analytics, external distribution, historical data migration
artifacts.critical_assumptions: Legal team engagement, AD stability, business user compliance competency, iframe integration capability
artifacts.non_negotiable_constraints: Banking compliance standards, data sovereignty, audit trail integrity, access control consistency

artifacts.current_process_map: Manual workflow: Business Request → Legal Review → Manual Creation → IT Development → Testing → Manual Deployment → Documentation
artifacts.system_landscape: File-based storage, manual access control, email-based approvals, manual versioning, ad-hoc exports, manual integration
artifacts.problem_areas: Audit trail deficiency (high risk), data governance fragmentation (medium-high risk), version control liability (medium risk)
artifacts.operational_inefficiencies: Manual access control (3-5 day lead time), process standardization gaps, integration inefficiencies (15-20% error rate)
artifacts.regulatory_risks: High audit trail exposure requiring immediate attention, medium-high data governance risks
artifacts.resource_impact: 5-7 FTE dedicated to manual survey management tasks, 40% case management time on access requests
artifacts.transformation_requirements: Automated compliance controls, self-service workflow, systematic risk mitigation, scalable platform foundation
